external_games.name: Captain A-Hole's Guide To Getting Old(er)

name: Captain A-Hole's Guide To Getting Old(er)
storyline: Have you ever felt like you are not getting old, but old-er? Captain has some stories for you! Experience a piece of Captain's life from the latest comic book, "Captain A-Hole's Guide to Getting Old(er)".
summary: Experience what it's like getting old(er) with Captain A-Hole. Purchase the comic to learn how to age the "Captain" way, as well as enter VR to undergo this new hand tracking storytelling experience.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Captain A-Hole's Guide To Getting Old(er)
